H0.text: who does demetrius love in a midsummer night dream. Hermia

H1.text: who does demetrius love in a midsummer night dream. Titania

H2.text: who does demetrius love in a midsummer night dream. Hippolyta

H3.text: who does demetrius love in a midsummer night dream. Helena

A4.text: the play ends with Demetrius very much in love with Helena

A5.text: Later, Puck pours the love juice into Demetrius' eyes as well, with the result that both Demetrius and Lysander fall in love with Helena and despise Hermia
